name: Raising Hell (logenlol, Pedro_r, dcheno99, junjie0302, ButterJZ, ClintK, igerrits13)
name_original: Raising Hell (logenlol, Pedro_r, dcheno99, junjie0302, ButterJZ, ClintK, igerrits13)
description:
You have no idea what this place is, this fog-shrouded island. Your only clue as to how you got here is a dinghy on the dock where you arrived. It is apparent that people have inhabited this island previously, but it is your job to find out what happened here. Be wary, as the island holds more secrets than meets the eye.

Developers

Logan Casali - Programmer

Ian Gerrits - Programmer

Julian Zhou - Programmer

Clint Koehler - Sound Design/Music

Leona Yao - Concept Art/UI Design

Pedro Ramirez - 3D Modeling/Texture

Nathan Cheng - 3D Modeling/Rigging/Animation

David Chenoweth - Writer/Environment Artist
